description:
The Texas Democratic Convention was a total circus this past Saturday, as they hosted clowns like David Hogg and a drag queen who goes by the name Brigitte Bandit, who also refers to himself as the “Dolly” of Austin.

Drag queen speaking at Texas Democratic Convention promotes puberty blockers, cross-s*x hormones, and s*x change surgery for minors. pic.twitter.com/mJdXYizpuT

Obviously, there is no explanation needed as to why this delusional man thinks he is the “Dolly” of Texas but
title: Not only is the Texas Dems’ featured speaker a drag queen, it’s a drag queen who hates America

A new phenomenon has emerged - the rise of the nerd-turned-bullies. These people were the stereotypical outcasts in high school; band geeks, theater nerds, and anime weirdos. However, these social outcasts now lead the leftist mob, as they try to inflict the pain they experienced in their younger years onto the masses. Thus, the Faucis and Zuckerbergs of the world now control the mob’s mentality.

A TikToker has gone viral on social media for describing this interesting phenomenon and has proclaimed what we are all thinking.
title: Watch: BASED TikToker explains how the nerds we picked on are now taking over the world

description:
